title: Create VPS Configuration
description: Creates or updates a VPS configuration application structure.

name.description: The name of the VPS configuration (e.g., hostinger, my-app-server). Used for directory name and project name.
name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use for this VPS configuration?

directory.description: The directory relative to apps/ where the configuration will be created (e.g., 'servers' -> apps/servers/your-name).

tags.description: Add tags to the project (used for linting, testing, affected commands). Comma-separated.

forceOverwrite.description: Overwrite existing files if the project configuration already exists. Use with caution.
